member.name: M:Web.Api.Versioned.Controllers.VersionedV1Controller.Get(Web.Api.Versioned.Controllers.ResponseTrigger)
member.summary: Minimal sample implementation of version 1 of the versioned service.
member.remarks:
Supported arguments: 0..4, 0 is default value and the Ok case, 1..4 give errors.
* Ok result - returns array of two strings * 1: 400 - BadRequest * 2: 404 - NotFound * 3: 409 - Conflict (with error details of type `ConflictDetails`) * 4: An uncatched exception resulting in 500 - InternalServerErrror
member.param: A value 0..4 for different error conditions.
member.returns: An array with two sample strings.

member.name: M:Web.Api.Versioned.Controllers.VersionedV1Controller.WithBody(Web.Api.Versioned.Controllers.GetBodyInput)
member.summary: WithBody - call with GET body. Note: on Swagger use POST.

member.name: M:Web.Api.Versioned.Controllers.VersionedV2Controller.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: Minimal sample implementation of version 2 of the versioned service.
member.remarks:
Supported arguments: 0..4, 0 is default value and the Ok case, 1..4 give errors.
* Ok result - returns array of two strings * 1: 400 - BadRequest * 2: 404 - NotFound * 3: 409 - Conflict (with error details of type ConflictDetails) * 4: An uncatched exception resulting in 500 - InternalServerErrror
member.param: A value 0..4 for different error conditions.
member.returns: An array with two sample strings.
